title: Team up and earn Party Rewards!

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ஜ۩۞۩ஜ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
              Attention all smurfs!
           ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ஜ۩۞۩ஜ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

If you want to get some fat stacks (of IP), or perhaps just crush some n00bs, join the in-client chat "smurfs".
Also, you should set it to "autojoin on startup" so you don't have to constantly rejoin the chat every time you log!

Here's a good example on how to join a chatroom btw: http://www.surrenderat20.net/p/na-chat-room.html
but in a week we are back to strangers.

Take this as an opportunity to make friends. 
If you go into a game solo, it means the rest of your teammates are a group of four or less.
Whenever you enjoy playing with a team, add people and make friends!

You can also use curse voice, share a link in lobby, to scout whether you enjoy playing with people and which to add them and play further.

So say I play a game with 4 other people in normals. (full group)
Lets say I have an First win of the day Ip bonus and Ip boost (1 day)
Normally you would get around 450-500IP For first win of the day plus ip boost.
Now lets times that number by 16 for full team.
500ip x 16 = 8,000 ip
gg rito

(so many smurfs are gonna be on as well)
Remember that 1st win of the day... it only happens once every 24 hours, so you need to fix your calculations :)

Bro you stupid or something?  Please read it again.  He didn't say anything about playing more than one game and winning. He said A GAME with 4 other people.  FIRST WIN OF THE DAY he isn't stupid he put it in there.  He can still get 8,000 ip in ONE GAME because of FIRST WIN OF THE DAY.

8000 ip is impossible, like ThatCoolKid said, the bonus IP only works with the base amount of IP earned, any additional bonuses such as FWOTD will not benefit from the 16x. Additionally however, the longer a game goes on for the more ip is earned, therefore in conclusion, longer games will benefit more from the party ip bonus, whereas other contributing factors such as FWOTD and ip boost do not benefit from it. Furthermore, the chances of receiving such bonus is fairly low as well as including the fact that getting that bonus on FWOTD is highly unlikely.
Counts base IP, not inclusive of FWOTD bonus.
It takes so long to get IP yet its gone in a {{summoner:4}}

How are they being stingy? This is a type of gift, you don't get a gift from someone and say "Wow, this is a cheap present". Riot didn't have to do this, they just decided they wanted to.

Was playing solo, got picked up by a team of four guys, then proceeded to join in on Teamspeak with them. We played 4 games, went 1-3, but that one win was absolutely worth it, and we had fun regardless of the outcome. Was fun!

This is going to lead to a lot of premades that have no co-ordination or communication.

THIS IS GREAT!
If premades have no co-ordination or communication, how does this differ them to normal solo players anyway?

That's the beauty of it. No longer will I run into being matched against a premade who has Skype/Curse enabled voice-chat and can co-ordinate highly sophisticated plans of action against me and my random stranger team-mates. It will return to being as if though there was no such thing as "duo-queue" or premades.

At least for the moment.
This will definitely make me rekindle with all the people lurking in my friendslist!
{{summoner:17}}

Ok, so dweebs aren't reading this properly and will begin complaining about not receiving their rewards, so let's cut to the chase:

"*There is a chance your group earns no Party Reward, but larger premade groups win higher tiers of IP rewards. Some lucky players will even earn rare, massive IP prizes. If you queue alone, you won’t be eligible for Party Rewards.*"

This statement means that you will not get the rewards every time. The more people the better the chance. 16x IP? Yeah, right, that'll be the day. What it means is 16x the chance for rewards. That means there are "massive prizes" being something like a large sum of I.P...

All this actually is, and you can re-read it again, "Party up for your chance to win! More people, more entries!". Riot wouldn't go and break the freaking game by giving people 3-5k I.P per game... They lose way too much from that.

Actually bro you read it wrong. The max jackpot is 16 times the IP not 16x chance. They didn't say what % of chance  you get for rewards they only stated you win hier tiers of rewards the more people you have on your premade team.
